item.title: Authorities 'aware of new message regarding Nancy Guthrie': Sheriff
item.description: The FBI and the Pima County Sheriff's Department area "aware of a new message regarding Nancy Guthrie," the sheriff's office said Friday.

item.title: Dow closes above 50,000 for the first time ever
item.description: A market surge propelled the Dow to a new record high.

item.title: WATCH: Disabled Minneapolis resident dragged, detained by ICE speaks out
